p: Curculigoside B ( m/z 453. 136, ion mode [M + H] +) belongs to the phenolic compound class. It is fragmented into m/z 290.271 [M + H-C 6H 12O 5] + after releasing the C 6H 12O 5 molecule and then becomes 276.244 [M + H-CH 2] + due to the release of CH 2 ( Figure S3D). Orchioside B ( m/z 463.149, ion mode [M + H] +) is fragmented into m/z 350.143 [M + H-C 6H 8O 2] +, which indicates the release of C 6H 8O 2 molecules followed by m/z 213.143 [M + H-C 8H 9O 2] + due to the release of C 8H 9O 2 molecules ( Figure S3E).
